traceability.evidence: • src/config-loader.js implements loading .dry-aged-deps.json from project root (or custom via --config-file) with schema validation and clear error messages (exit code 2). • src/cli-options.js merges config values with CLI flags (precedence CLI > config > defaults) and applies sensible defaults when no config present. • test/cli.config-file.test.js covers reading defaults from config, CLI override, invalid JSON, unknown keys, invalid values, custom config-file flag, and missing custom file behaviors. • README.md documents --config-file flag, shows example .dry-aged-deps.json schema and usage without flags. • No breaking changes when config absent; existing CLI-only workflows remain unchanged.
traceability.notes: All mandatory acceptance criteria for configuration file support are implemented, tested, and documented. Optional JSON schema support was considered but is non-blocking per story notes.
